attributes.action: sack Jacqui Smith over her second home expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: anyone who thinks they can live in their sister's spare room and claim it's their main residence whilst family life continues at their expensed 'second home' should be neither an MP nor have responsibility for an office of state

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
